product_name: The North Face DNP Jacket - Women's
long_description: Super lightweight and very warm, the women's DNP Jacket from The North Face aces spring alpine missions with PrimaLoft(R) One(R) insulation and innovative hybrid construction. 60g PrimaLoft(R) One(R) insulation, quilted in the core, delivers a high warmth-to-weight ratio, dries quickly and insulates even when wet. Side and underarm panels are made of a lightweight, stretchy soft-shell fabric that breathes well as you work hard, increases mobility and reduces bulk. Ripstop nylon shell fabric features a durable water repellent finish to shed light moisture. Minimalist stretch-knit cuffs seal in warmth without bulky tabs and can be easily pushed up to vent your arms. The North Face DNP Jacket for women features an adjustable hem and zippered hand pockets. Zippered hand pocket doubles as a compressible stow pouch. This jacket is part of The North Face Summit Series(TM), apparel designed and tested for use in harsh environments.
short_description: Super lightweight and very warm, the women's DNP Jacket from The North Face aces spring alpine missions with PrimaLoft(R) One(R) insulation and innovative hybrid construction.
